data.content:
Rakan: The Charmer

Release Date: April 19, 2017

Rakan, the Charmer, is a support champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his captivating personality and agile movements, Rakan has quickly become a fan favorite since his release on April 19, 2017. In this article, we will delve into Rakan's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his significant role in the League of Legends universe.

Background Story

Rakan hails from the vastayan tribe known as the Lhotlan, who reside in the forests of Ionia. As a charismatic and mischievous creature, Rakan is a natural-born performer and entertainer. He possesses the ability to manipulate the air around him, granting him incredible agility and grace. Rakan's life took an unexpected turn when he met Xayah, a fellow vastayan and his soulmate.

Xayah and Rakan share an unbreakable bond, both emotionally and physically. They are connected through their shared magic, allowing them to communicate telepathically and enhancing their abilities when they fight side by side. Rakan's love for Xayah is unwavering, and he will stop at nothing to protect her and their cause.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Rakan's strengths lie in his ability to engage and disrupt the enemy team. With his quick movements and crowd control abilities, he excels at initiating team fights and catching opponents off guard. His primary strength lies in his ability to charm enemies, rendering them unable to attack or move for a short duration. This crowd control effect can turn the tide of a battle and allow his team to secure kills or objectives.

Additionally, Rakan possesses a unique ability called
which allows him to dash into the enemy team, knocking them up and creating chaos. This ability, combined with his charm, makes him a formidable force in team fights. Rakan's ultimate ability,

grants him increased movement speed and the ability to charm multiple enemies in a large area, further solidifying his role as a disruptor and initiator.

However, Rakan does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. His squishy nature and lack of sustained damage make him vulnerable when caught out of position. Rakan heavily relies on his mobility and crowd control to survive, so if his abilities are on cooldown or he is unable to engage effectively, he becomes an easy target for the enemy team. Additionally, Rakan's charm ability can be cleansed or interrupted, reducing its effectiveness in certain situations.

Rakan in the Game

In League of Legends, Rakan is primarily played as a support champion in the bot lane alongside his partner, Xayah. Their synergy is unparalleled, and their abilities complement each other perfectly. Rakan's role is to protect and enable Xayah, ensuring she can deal damage safely while also engaging and disrupting the enemy team.

Rakan's playstyle revolves around his ability to roam and make plays across the map. With his high mobility and crowd control, he can quickly move between lanes and assist his teammates in securing kills or objectives. Rakan's presence in team fights is crucial, as his engaging abilities can turn the tide of battle in his team's favor.

As a support champion, Rakan's primary focus is on providing utility to his team rather than dealing damage. He excels at protecting his allies, healing them with his ability
and shielding them with his ultimate ability,

Rakan's versatility allows him to adapt to different situations, whether it be engaging, disengaging, or peeling for his carries.

Rakan's unique playstyle and captivating personality have made him a popular pick among players. His flashy abilities and engaging gameplay make him a joy to watch and play. Whether you're a fan of his charming personality or his ability to turn the tide of battle, Rakan is a champion that brings excitement and flair to the game.

Explore Rakan's Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Rakan's skins. From the elegant
to the playful

each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer a more serious or lighthearted look for Rakan, our website has you covered.

Experience the full range of Rakan's charm and style by exploring his skins on our dedicated page. Watch the videos, read about the inspiration behind each skin, and find the perfect look to showcase your personality in the game.

Rakan, the Charmer, has captured the hearts of League of Legends players with his captivating personality and engaging gameplay. Whether you're looking to support your team, make flashy plays, or simply enjoy the thrill of playing a charismatic champion, Rakan is a fantastic choice. Embrace the power of the vastaya and let Rakan's charm guide you to victory!

Rakan (Broken Covenant Rakan)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 20, 2021

Rakan, the Charmer, is a charismatic and agile champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his graceful movements and charming personality, Rakan has captured the hearts of players since his release. With his latest skin,

players can now experience a darker side of this beloved champion.

Released on April 20, 2021, the Broken Covenant Rakan skin offers a unique and edgy look for Rakan, transforming him into a mysterious and enigmatic character. This skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP, allowing players to unlock a whole new visual experience for their favorite champion.

The Broken Covenant Rakan skin features a complete overhaul of Rakan's appearance, giving him a more sinister and menacing vibe. His usual vibrant and colorful feathers are replaced with dark, tattered wings, symbolizing his fall from grace. The skin also introduces new particle effects and animations, enhancing the overall visual experience.

One of the standout features of the Broken Covenant Rakan skin is the attention to detail in its design. From the intricate patterns on his wings to the subtle changes in his dance animations, every aspect of the skin has been carefully crafted to create a cohesive and captivating look. The skin truly captures the essence of a fallen hero, adding depth and complexity to Rakan's character.

As a support champion, Rakan excels in engaging and protecting his allies. With his charming personality and swift movements, he can easily navigate the battlefield, providing crowd control and healing to his team. The Broken Covenant Rakan skin adds a new layer of depth to his playstyle, allowing players to embody a more mysterious and unpredictable version of the champion.

In terms of strengths, Rakan's mobility is unparalleled. His ability to dash in and out of fights, coupled with his crowd control abilities, makes him a formidable force on the battlefield. His ultimate ability, The Quickness, allows him to charm and knock up multiple enemies, turning the tide of team fights in his team's favor.

However, Rakan also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other champions. His abilities require precise timing and positioning to be effective, making him a high skill-cap champion. Additionally, Rakan heavily relies on his ADC (Attack Damage Carry) to follow up on his engages, making coordination crucial for success.

In the lore of League of Legends, Rakan is part of a duo alongside his partner, Xayah. They are lovers and rebels who fight against the oppressive rule of the vastayan elders. Rakan is a charismatic and flamboyant character, known for his extravagant dance moves and playful personality. He is deeply devoted to Xayah and will do anything to protect her.

Rakan's story is intertwined with Xayah's, as they share a bond that goes beyond their romantic relationship. Together, they seek to overthrow the vastayan elders and restore freedom to their people. Rakan's loyalty and dedication to his cause make him a beloved character among players.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Rakan, including the Broken Covenant Rakan skin. Whether you're a fan of his charming personality or a player looking to enhance your gameplay with this unique skin, we've got you covered.

Rakan (SSG Rakan)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 27, 2018

Rakan, the Charmer, is a support champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his agility, charm, and ability to engage in team fights, Rakan has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing the support role. With his flashy abilities and charismatic personality, Rakan has quickly become a fan-favorite champion.

One of Rakan's most popular skins is the

skin, which was released on September 27, 2018. This skin is part of the Samsung Galaxy team skins collection, celebrating the team's victory in the 2017 League of Legends World Championship. The SSG Rakan skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP.

The SSG Rakan skin features a sleek and futuristic design, with Rakan donning the colors and logo of the Samsung Galaxy team. His feathers are replaced with glowing blue energy, and his outfit is adorned with high-tech details. The skin also includes new visual effects for Rakan's abilities, giving them a unique and stylish look.

With the SSG Rakan skin, players can experience a new level of immersion as they play as their favorite support champion. The skin not only changes Rakan's appearance but also adds a sense of prestige and accomplishment, as players can show off their support for the Samsung Galaxy team.

Now, let's take a closer look at Rakan himself. Rakan is a Vastayan champion, hailing from the tribe of Lhotlan. He is known for his incredible agility and charm, which he uses to dazzle his enemies and protect his allies. Rakan's abilities revolve around mobility and crowd control, making him a valuable asset in team fights.

Rakan's passive ability, Fey Feathers, allows him to periodically generate a shield for himself and his ally when he lands a basic attack. This shield provides additional protection in the heat of battle, allowing Rakan to engage and disengage with ease.

His Q ability, Gleaming Quill, allows Rakan to damage enemies and heal himself and his ally. This ability is crucial for sustaining in lane and keeping his team alive during team fights.

Rakan's W ability, Grand Entrance, is his primary engage tool. He dashes into the air and slams down, damaging and knocking up enemies in the area. This ability is perfect for initiating team fights or catching out enemies who are out of position.

The E ability, Battle Dance, is Rakan's mobility tool. He dashes to an ally, shielding them and granting them bonus movement speed. This ability allows Rakan to quickly reposition himself and his allies, making him a highly mobile support champion.

Finally, Rakan's ultimate ability, The Quickness, is a game-changer. He leaps into the air and charms all nearby enemies, rendering them unable to act for a short duration. This ability can turn the tide of a team fight and allow Rakan's team to secure crucial objectives or eliminate key targets.

In the world of League of Legends, Rakan is a versatile support champion who excels at engaging and protecting his team. His mobility and crowd control make him a valuable asset in team fights, and his ability to charm enemies adds an element of unpredictability to his playstyle.

Overall, Rakan is a champion who brings excitement and flair to the support role. With his charming personality and flashy abilities, he has quickly become a fan-favorite among players. Whether you're looking to engage in epic team fights or protect your allies, Rakan is a champion who can do it all.

For more information about Rakan and his various appearances, including the SSG Rakan skin, be sure to check out the League of Legends website or watch videos on the official League of Legends YouTube channel. Embrace the charm and agility of Rakan and experience the thrill of playing as this charismatic support champion.

Rakan (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Rakan, the Charmer, is a charismatic and agile champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the game's support champions, Rakan has the ability to charm and engage enemies while providing protection and utility to his allies. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Rakan's default costume and explore all the intricate details of his appearance.

The Story of Rakan's Default Costume

Rakan's default costume showcases his vibrant and flamboyant personality. He is depicted as a nimble and graceful creature, adorned with intricate golden armor and feathers. The costume perfectly captures his essence as a charming and mischievous champion, ready to dance into battle with his partner, Xayah.

The default costume features Rakan wearing a feathered headdress, which symbolizes his connection to the Vastaya, a race of magical creatures in the game's lore. The headdress is adorned with vibrant feathers that match Rakan's vibrant personality. His armor is intricately designed with golden accents, reflecting his regal and charismatic nature. The flowing fabric of his outfit adds to his agile and graceful movements, allowing him to effortlessly glide across the battlefield.

Rakan's default costume also includes a pair of elegant wings, which enable him to soar through the air with grace and agility. These wings are not only a visual representation of his abilities but also serve a functional purpose in the game. Rakan can use his wings to dash towards allies, providing them with much-needed protection or engaging enemies in the heat of battle.

Overall, Rakan's default costume is a visual masterpiece that perfectly captures his personality and abilities. It showcases his vibrant and flamboyant nature, while also highlighting his connection to the Vastaya and his role as a support champion.

Rakan: The Charmer

Rakan is not only known for his captivating appearance but also for his unique playstyle and abilities. As a support champion, Rakan excels at engaging enemies, providing crowd control, and protecting his allies. His abilities revolve around charm, agility, and teamwork, making him a valuable asset in any team composition.

Rakan's primary ability is his

where he gracefully leaps into the air and slams the ground, damaging and knocking up enemies in his path. This ability allows him to initiate team fights or catch enemies off guard, setting up opportunities for his team to secure kills. Additionally, Rakan's

ability enables him to dash to an ally, providing them with a shield and granting them bonus movement speed. This ability is crucial for protecting vulnerable teammates or engaging in aggressive plays.

One of Rakan's most unique abilities is his

where he begins to dance, charming and damaging nearby enemies while also gaining a significant movement speed boost. This ability not only provides crowd control but also allows Rakan to swiftly navigate the battlefield, making him a slippery target for enemies. Combined with his other abilities, Rakan becomes a formidable force, capable of turning the tide of battles in his team's favor.

Despite his strengths, Rakan does have weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other champions. Rakan heavily relies on his abilities and coordination with his partner, Xayah, to maximize his effectiveness. Additionally, his engaging playstyle can sometimes leave him vulnerable to counter-attacks if not executed properly.

Rakan's Place in the Game

Rakan's unique playstyle and abilities make him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His ability to engage, protect, and charm enemies makes him a versatile support champion that can fit into various team compositions. Rakan's synergy with Xayah, his partner in both lore and gameplay, further enhances his effectiveness, allowing for devastating combinations and coordinated plays.

In the competitive scene, Rakan has seen significant play due to his ability to initiate team fights and provide crowd control. His engaging playstyle and flashy abilities make him an exciting champion to watch, often leading to thrilling moments and game-changing plays. Rakan's presence in the game adds depth and diversity to the support role, providing players with a unique and enjoyable gameplay experience.

Explore Rakan's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Rakan and his various appearances, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. Discover the different skins available for Rakan, each with its own unique theme and visual effects. From the charming
skin to the elegant

skin, there is a skin for every Rakan enthusiast to enjoy.

Whether you're a fan of Rakan's default costume or interested in exploring his alternate appearances, our page provides a comprehensive resource for all things Rakan. Immerse yourself in the world of League of Legends and discover the captivating charm of Rakan, the Charmer.

Rakan (iG Rakan)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 3, 2018

Rakan, the Charmer, is a charismatic and agile support champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his flashy playstyle and ability to engage and disengage fights with ease, Rakan has become a favorite pick among players who enjoy making flashy plays and providing utility to their team. With his iG Rakan skin, Rakan takes on the colors and style of the Invictus Gaming (iG) esports team, paying homage to their victory in the 2018 League of Legends World Championship.

The iG Rakan skin is a part of the Championship skin line, which celebrates the achievements of professional teams in the League of Legends competitive scene. This particular skin was released on November 3, 2018, shortly after Invictus Gaming's victory in the World Championship. Priced at 1350 RP, the iG Rakan skin offers players a chance to embody the spirit of the championship-winning team and show their support for Invictus Gaming.

With the iG Rakan skin, Rakan's appearance undergoes a complete transformation. He dons the iconic black and gold colors of Invictus Gaming, with intricate patterns and designs adorning his outfit. His feathers take on a metallic sheen, reflecting the team's success and prestige. Rakan's abilities also receive visual updates, with new particle effects and animations that match the theme of the skin.

Now, let's delve into the story of Rakan and his journey in the League of Legends universe. Rakan, along with his partner Xayah, were introduced to the game in April 2017 as a duo of Vastaya champions. Hailing from a race of magical creatures, Rakan and Xayah share a deep bond and fight together to protect their kind from those who seek to harm them.

Rakan is a highly mobile champion, capable of dashing around the battlefield and engaging enemies with his charm and grace. His abilities allow him to initiate fights, disrupt the enemy team, and provide support to his allies. His ultimate ability, The Quickness, grants him increased movement speed and charm effects, making him a formidable force in team fights.

However, Rakan's strengths come with their fair share of weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other champions. Rakan relies heavily on his mobility and crowd control to survive and make an impact in fights. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness, making him a challenging champion to master.

In the lore of League of Legends, Rakan and Xayah are rebels who fight against the oppressive rule of humans and seek to restore balance to the world. They are known for their passionate love and unwavering dedication to their cause. Rakan's playful and flamboyant personality contrasts with Xayah's more serious and focused demeanor, creating a dynamic duo that captures the hearts of players and fans alike.

Rakan's story and gameplay have made him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His ability to engage fights and provide utility to his team makes him a valuable asset in team compositions. Rakan is often paired with Xayah in the bot lane, where their synergy and shared abilities create a formidable duo that can dominate the laning phase and carry their team to victory.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Rakan's appearances, including the iG Rakan skin. Whether you're a fan of Invictus Gaming or simply appreciate Rakan's charming playstyle, the iG Rakan skin is a must-have for any dedicated Rakan player.

Rakan (Arcana Rakan)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 10, 2021

Rakan, the Charmer, is a charismatic and agile support champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his mesmerizing dance moves and charming personality, Rakan has won the hearts of players around the world. As a support, Rakan excels at protecting his allies and engaging in team fights with his crowd control abilities. His latest skin, Arcana Rakan, takes his enchanting nature to a whole new level.

Arcana Rakan is a visually stunning skin that transforms Rakan into a mystical being from another realm. The skin features intricate golden patterns and ethereal effects, giving Rakan an otherworldly appearance. His feathers are adorned with glowing runes, and his dance moves are enhanced with magical particles, creating a mesmerizing display of power and grace.

The Arcana Rakan skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. It offers a significant visual upgrade to Rakan's base appearance, making it a worthwhile investment for players who enjoy playing as the Charmer.

Now, let's delve into the story behind the Arcana Rakan skin. In the lore of League of Legends, Rakan is a Vastayan, a race of magical creatures who are deeply connected to nature. They possess the ability to harness the raw magic of the world, and Rakan is no exception. However, his connection to the arcane arts is particularly strong, allowing him to tap into the mystical energies of the Arcana.

The Arcana is a realm of pure magic, existing parallel to the physical world. It is a place of immense power and beauty, inhabited by ancient beings who have mastered the art of manipulating arcane energies. Rakan's journey to the Arcana begins when he discovers an ancient artifact, a key that unlocks the gateway between the mortal realm and the Arcana.

Driven by curiosity and a thirst for adventure, Rakan embarks on a quest to unlock the secrets of the Arcana. With the key in his possession, he opens the gateway and steps into a world unlike anything he has ever seen. The Arcana welcomes him with open arms, and he is immediately captivated by its beauty and power.

As Rakan explores the Arcana, he encounters its inhabitants, the Arcanists. These ancient beings are the guardians of the realm, tasked with preserving its magic and knowledge. They are intrigued by Rakan's presence, as he possesses a unique connection to the Arcana. Recognizing his potential, they offer to teach him the ways of their magic.

Under the guidance of the Arcanists, Rakan hones his skills and learns to channel the raw power of the Arcana. He discovers new dance moves that are infused with arcane energy, allowing him to mesmerize his enemies and protect his allies with even greater efficiency. The Arcana Rakan skin reflects this newfound mastery, with its dazzling visual effects and intricate details.

With his newfound powers, Rakan becomes a formidable force on the battlefield. His ability to charm and engage enemies is enhanced by the arcane energies coursing through his veins. He dances across the battlefield, leaving a trail of magic in his wake, and his allies are inspired by his presence, fighting with renewed vigor.

However, Rakan's journey in the Arcana is not without its challenges. The realm is not without its dangers, and there are those who seek to exploit its power for their own gain. Rakan must navigate treacherous paths and face formidable foes to protect the Arcana from falling into the wrong hands.

As players take on the role of Rakan in the game, they can experience the thrill of his adventures in the Arcana. With the Arcana Rakan skin, they can embody the power and grace of this mystical realm, captivating their enemies and supporting their allies with style.

In conclusion, the Arcana Rakan skin offers players a visually stunning and thematically rich experience. With its intricate details and mesmerizing effects, it brings Rakan's connection to the Arcana to life. Whether you're a fan of Rakan or simply appreciate beautifully designed skins, Arcana Rakan is a must-have addition to your collection.

For more information and videos showcasing all of Rakan's appearances, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the Charmer. Explore his various skins and discover the magic of Rakan in League of Legends.

Rakan (Cosmic Dawn Rakan)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: April 19, 2018

Rakan, the Charmer, is a charismatic and agile support champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his flashy playstyle and ability to engage and disengage fights with ease, Rakan has become a favorite pick among players who enjoy making impactful plays on the Rift. With his Cosmic Dawn Rakan skin, he takes on a celestial appearance, embodying the power of the cosmos.

Cosmic Dawn Rakan: A Celestial Transformation

Cosmic Dawn Rakan is a visually stunning skin that transforms Rakan into a cosmic being. With vibrant colors and intricate cosmic patterns, this skin truly stands out on the battlefield. Rakan's feathers are replaced with ethereal cosmic energy, giving him an otherworldly presence. His abilities also receive a cosmic makeover, with dazzling effects that leave a trail of stardust in their wake.

One of the most notable changes in Cosmic Dawn Rakan is his recall animation. When Rakan recalls, he ascends into the sky, surrounded by a swirling galaxy of stars. It's a breathtaking sight that perfectly captures the celestial theme of the skin.

Overall, Cosmic Dawn Rakan is a visually stunning skin that adds a touch of cosmic beauty to Rakan's already charming persona. It's a must-have for any Rakan enthusiast or collector of visually striking skins.

Rakan: The Charmer

Rakan is a champion with a rich lore and a unique playstyle. He is part of the vast universe of League of Legends, where champions from different backgrounds and regions come together to battle it out on the Fields of Justice. Rakan hails from the region of Ionia, a land known for its connection to spiritual energy and harmony.

In the game, Rakan is a support champion who excels at engaging and protecting his allies. His abilities allow him to dash around the battlefield, charming enemies and providing crowd control. Rakan's ultimate ability, The Quickness, grants him and his nearby allies a burst of movement speed, making him a valuable asset in team fights.

As a support champion, Rakan's strengths lie in his ability to initiate fights and peel for his carries. His mobility and crowd control make him a formidable presence in the bot lane, where he can set up kills for his ADC (Attack Damage Carry) and keep them safe from harm. Rakan's weaknesses, on the other hand, lie in his squishiness and reliance on his abilities. If caught out of position or unable to engage effectively, Rakan can be easily punished by the enemy team.

Rakan's story in the game is intertwined with that of his partner, Xayah. The two are lovers and rebels who fight against the oppressive rule of the Ionian government. Rakan's charm and charisma make him a natural leader, while his agility and quick thinking allow him to outmaneuver his enemies. Together, Rakan and Xayah form a deadly duo, capable of turning the tide of battle with their combined strength.

Explore Rakan's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Rakan and his various appearances in League of Legends, you've come to the right place. On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Rakan's skins, including the stunning Cosmic Dawn Rakan. Whether you're a fan of his charming base appearance or want to explore the cosmic beauty of his alternate skins, we've got you covered.

So sit back, relax, and immerse yourself in the world of Rakan. Discover his strengths, weaknesses, and the stories that make him a beloved champion in the League of Legends community. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, Rakan's charm and playstyle are sure to captivate you.

Remember, the Rift is waiting, and Rakan is ready to charm his way to victory. Are you ready to join him?

Rakan (Elderwood Rakan)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 20, 2018

Rakan, the Charmer, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his agility, charm, and support abilities, Rakan has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing as a support role. With his ability to engage and disengage fights, Rakan is a versatile champion that can turn the tide of battle in his team's favor.

One of Rakan's most captivating skins is the

skin. Released on September 20, 2018, this skin immerses Rakan in the mystical and enchanting world of the Elderwood. With its intricate design and ethereal effects, the Elderwood Rakan skin offers players a unique and visually stunning experience.

The Elderwood Rakan skin transforms Rakan into a woodland spirit, adorned with leaves, flowers, and other natural elements. His feathers take on a vibrant green hue, and his wings become more intricate and reminiscent of tree branches. The skin also introduces new particle effects, such as leaves and petals swirling around Rakan as he moves, adding to the magical ambiance of the skin.

One of the standout features of the Elderwood Rakan skin is the recall animation. When Rakan recalls, he is enveloped in a swirling vortex of leaves and flowers, transporting him back to the Elderwood realm. This animation perfectly captures the essence of the skin and adds an extra layer of immersion for players.

As with all skins in League of Legends, the Elderwood Rakan skin is purely cosmetic and does not provide any gameplay advantages. However, the visual enhancements and attention to detail make it a highly sought-after skin among Rakan enthusiasts and collectors.

Rakan: The Charmer

Rakan, the Charmer, is a champion with a rich backstory and a unique set of abilities. Born in the vastayan tribe known as the Lhotlan, Rakan was destined for greatness from a young age. His natural charm and charisma made him a beloved figure among his people, and he quickly rose to become one of the tribe's most respected warriors.

However, Rakan's life took an unexpected turn when he encountered Xayah, a fellow vastayan and rebel. Instantly captivated by her spirit and determination, Rakan abandoned his tribe to join Xayah in her fight against those who sought to oppress their kind. Together, they became a formidable duo, using their combined powers to protect their people and seek justice.

In the game, Rakan's abilities reflect his agile and supportive nature. His passive ability, Fey Feathers, grants him a shield when he enters combat, providing him with extra durability. His Q ability, Gleaming Quill, allows him to damage enemies and heal allies simultaneously, making him a valuable asset in team fights.

Rakan's W ability, Grand Entrance, is his signature engage tool. With a graceful leap, Rakan can dash into the heart of the enemy team, knocking up and damaging all nearby enemies. This ability sets up opportunities for his team to follow up with devastating attacks, turning the tide of battle in their favor.

His E ability, Battle Dance, allows Rakan to dash to an ally, shielding them and granting them bonus movement speed. This ability not only provides utility but also allows Rakan to quickly reposition himself in fights, making him a slippery target for enemies to catch.

Finally, Rakan's ultimate ability, The Quickness, is a game-changer. When activated, Rakan becomes an unstoppable force, charming and damaging all enemies in a large area around him. This ability can single-handedly turn the tide of a team fight, allowing Rakan and his allies to secure crucial kills and objectives.

Rakan's strengths lie in his ability to engage fights and provide support to his team. His mobility and crowd control make him a nightmare for enemy carries, as he can quickly close the gap and disrupt their positioning. Additionally, his healing and shielding abilities make him a valuable asset in protecting his allies and keeping them alive during intense battles.

However, Rakan does have weaknesses. His squishy nature and reliance on engaging fights make him vulnerable to burst damage and crowd control. If caught out of position or unable to engage effectively, Rakan can quickly find himself overwhelmed by the enemy team. Additionally, his healing and shielding abilities are not as potent as dedicated support champions, making him more reliant on his mobility and crowd control to make an impact.

In the world of League of Legends, Rakan has become a beloved champion among players who enjoy the support role. His unique playstyle and engaging abilities make him a joy to play, and his charming personality adds an extra layer of enjoyment to the game.

For more information about Rakan and his various appearances, including the Elderwood Rakan skin, be sure to visit the official League of Legends website or check out the champion spotlight videos available on YouTube. Whether you're a fan of Rakan's support abilities or simply appreciate his charismatic nature, the Elderwood Rakan skin is a must-have for any dedicated Rakan player.

Rakan (Star Guardian Rakan)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: September 7, 2017

Rakan, the Charmer, has always been known for his flamboyant personality and graceful movements. As a champion in the popular online game League of Legends, Rakan has captured the hearts of players with his charming abilities and engaging playstyle. And now, with the release of the Star Guardian Rakan skin, players can experience a whole new level of enchantment.

The Star Guardian Rakan skin was released on September 7, 2017, and quickly became a fan favorite. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a stunning visual transformation for Rakan, turning him into a celestial being adorned in vibrant colors and cosmic energy. With this skin, Rakan joins the ranks of the Star Guardians, a group of champions who have sworn to protect the universe from evil.

Star Guardian Rakan is a sight to behold. His once golden feathers are now replaced with shimmering blue and purple hues, reflecting the vastness of the cosmos. His outfit is adorned with intricate patterns and glowing gems, giving him an otherworldly appearance. The skin also features new visual effects, such as sparkling stardust trails when he dashes or leaps into battle. Additionally, his abilities have been given a cosmic makeover, with dazzling animations and celestial particles that add a touch of magic to his every move.

But the Star Guardian Rakan skin is not just about visual enhancements. It also brings a new level of immersion to the game. With the skin equipped, players can truly feel like they are embodying the essence of a Star Guardian, fighting alongside their allies to protect the universe. The skin's audio effects have been revamped to match its celestial theme, with ethereal sounds and enchanting melodies accompanying Rakan's every action. This attention to detail creates a truly immersive experience for players, making them feel like they are part of an epic cosmic battle.

Now, let's delve into the story of Rakan and his place in the League of Legends universe. Rakan is a Vastayan, a race of magical creatures who are deeply connected to nature. He hails from a tribe known as the Lhotlan, who are renowned for their love of dance and music. Rakan himself is a skilled dancer, using his graceful movements to captivate and charm his enemies.

In the game, Rakan is classified as a support champion, excelling in protecting and aiding his allies. His abilities revolve around mobility and crowd control, making him a valuable asset in team fights. His most iconic ability is his Grand Entrance, where he gracefully leaps into battle, knocking up enemies and providing an opportunity for his team to engage. Rakan's strengths lie in his ability to initiate fights, peel for his carries, and provide utility to his team with his healing and shielding abilities.

However, Rakan also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable if caught out of position. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and coordination with his ADC (Attack Damage Carry) to maximize their effectiveness. Rakan's playstyle requires good communication and synergy with his team, as he relies heavily on his allies to follow up on his engages.

As for Rakan's story within the League of Legends universe, he is deeply connected to another champion named Xayah. The two are lovers and share a unique bond, both in lore and gameplay. Xayah is a deadly ADC who specializes in dealing damage, while Rakan supports her with his crowd control and protective abilities. Together, they form a formidable duo, capable of wreaking havoc on the battlefield.

Rakan's story is one of love, loyalty, and adventure. He and Xayah are rebels who fight against the oppressive rule of the vastayan elders, who seek to control their kind. Rakan's journey in the game revolves around his quest to protect Xayah and their shared ideals, as they navigate the complexities of the League of Legends universe.

skin, which adds a touch of romance and elegance to his character.

With the Sweetheart Rakan skin, Rakan's appearance undergoes a complete transformation. He dons a dashing red suit with golden accents, exuding charm and sophistication. His feathers are replaced with delicate rose petals, symbolizing love and passion. The skin also features heart-shaped particles and effects, adding a romantic touch to his abilities.

When Rakan uses his Q ability, Gleaming Quill, he throws heart-shaped feathers at his enemies, leaving a trail of rose petals in their wake. The E ability, Battle Dance, showcases Rakan's devotion to his partner, as he envelops them in a heart-shaped shield. Finally, his ultimate ability, The Quickness, transforms into a whirlwind of love, with hearts swirling around him as he dashes through the battlefield.
